laboratory_examinations.findings: Moderate-to-severe subaortic stenosis, large patent ductus arteriosus, mild pericardial effusion, severe left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH); Peak pressure gradient 70 mm Hg, mean pressure gradient 45 mm Hg.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiogram showed moderate LVH, peak pressure gradient of 51 mm Hg, mean pressure gradient of 32 mm Hg.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Moderate aortic stenosis, moderate LVH; LVOT pressure gradient was 90 mm Hg, mean pressure gradient 55 mm Hg.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperative echocardiography showed moderate aortic valvular stenosis and a peak pressure gradient of 72 mm Hg.
